special_abilities: ***All Hands On Deck!*** On initiative count 20, after the first round, 2-4 pirates emerge from below decks, or swing in from the rigging.
bonus_actions: ***Avast Ye Scurvy Dogs!*** The captain barks an order and one pirate gets to make a basic attack.
reactions: ***Eek!*** When an enemy would hit Yendan with an attack, he swaps places with an adjacent pirate, causing them to take the hit instead. He can then move up to his speed.
